main event: A military aircraft crew observed an unidentified flying object that appeared round or oval, approximately six inches in diameter, with continuously changing colors of red, green, and white on 25 Sep 1960.
interesting points: The object was very bright and was seen for a total of four minutes,The object passed from view behind a cloud bank,The object was likely misidentified as atmospheric refraction of the star Arcturus as per Air Force analysis.,The object's colors persisted for three to four seconds each before changing.,No sound was detected during the observation.
sighted object: a round or oval object changing colors
witness description: crew members of a military aircraft
